original_administrative_title: ND2 2.2 5 Proven Tips to Make Talking About New Dimension Easier
administrative_title: ND2 2.2 5 Proven Tips to Make Talking About New Dimension Easier
subtitle: 5 Proven Tips to Make Talking About New Dimension Easier
intro_html: We’ve been selling New Dimension Shape + Fill Expert Serum for months, and we’ve definitely picked up some tested and proven tips (from you) along the way. Here’s what really works when talking about this breakthough serum with your customers. Try it!

content_object_headline: 5 Proven Tips to Make Talking About New Dimension Easier

original_administrative_title: ND2 2.2 5 Proven Tips to Make Talking About New Dimension Easier
parent_item_administrative_title: ND2 2.2 5 Proven Tips to Make Talking About New Dimension Easier
administrative_title: ND2 2.2 5 Proven Tips to Make Talking About New Dimension Easier - List 1
subtitle: 5 Proven Tips to Make Talking About New Dimension Easier
list_item_group_text_html:
#1 CUSTOMERS LOVE YOUR TESTIMONIALS

If you haven’t started using New Dimension Shape + Fill Expert serum, START NOW! Grab a bottle (even if you don’t think it’s for you) and take our 2-week challenge. 

Use it every morning and evening for the next two weeks and track your results. Then, tell customers what you think (and notice the the compliments you’re getting!)—nothing, and we mean nothing, sells a product better than your review.

original_administrative_title: ND2 2.2 5 Proven Tips to Make Talking About New Dimension Easier
parent_item_administrative_title: ND2 2.2 5 Proven Tips to Make Talking About New Dimension Easier
administrative_title: ND2 2.2 5 Proven Tips to Make Talking About New Dimension Easier - List 2
subtitle: 5 Proven Tips to Make Talking About New Dimension Easier
list_item_group_text_html:
#2 HOOK HER WITH A HEADLINE 

We asked Beauty Advisors what works when introducing New Dimension and it’s quick headlines.  Here’s the top 4 headlines to start using now—

• It’s our first fast-acting Shape + Fill treatment
• Skin is radiant—instantly
• See visible results—in just 3 days. And the results get even better—over time
• Women love it. Read the rave reviews on esteelauder.com!
P.S. These headlines are now on your updated New Dimension selling tool.

original_administrative_title: ND2 2.2 5 Proven Tips to Make Talking About New Dimension Easier
parent_item_administrative_title: ND2 2.2 5 Proven Tips to Make Talking About New Dimension Easier
administrative_title: ND2 2.2 5 Proven Tips to Make Talking About New Dimension Easier - List 3
subtitle: 5 Proven Tips to Make Talking About New Dimension Easier
list_item_group_text_html:
#3 TELL HER WHY IT’S SUCH AN INNOVATION

Over time our facial contours can begin to flatten out. We naturally lose the shape and fill, contouring and elasticity that give our faces a natural look of dimension.  New Dimension Shape + Fill Expert Serum firms and helps improve visible structure and volume to help your skin’s natural contours look more defined.

original_administrative_title: ND2 2.2 5 Proven Tips to Make Talking About New Dimension Easier
parent_item_administrative_title: ND2 2.2 5 Proven Tips to Make Talking About New Dimension Easier
administrative_title: ND2 2.2 5 Proven Tips to Make Talking About New Dimension Easier - List 4
subtitle: 5 Proven Tips to Make Talking About New Dimension Easier
list_item_group_text_html:
#4 USE YOUR TOOL…FOR HER! 

We’ve heard from some Beauty Advisors that they don’t need the tool with their customers. But guess what? Customers said the opposite! Customers told us they like seeing benefits in print. So the tool is really for her.

original_administrative_title: ND2 2.2 5 Proven Tips to Make Talking About New Dimension Easier
parent_item_administrative_title: ND2 2.2 5 Proven Tips to Make Talking About New Dimension Easier
administrative_title: ND2 2.2 5 Proven Tips to Make Talking About New Dimension Easier - List 5
subtitle: 5 Proven Tips to Make Talking About New Dimension Easier
intro_html: We’ve been selling New Dimension Shape + Fill Expert Serum for months, and we’ve definitely picked up some tested and proven tips (from you) along the way. Here’s what really works when talking about this breakthough serum with your customers. Try it!
list_item_group_text_html:
#5 USE THE MIRROR AND GESTURES—IT WORKS.

Talking about volume + structure and skin can sound like something out of a sci-fi movie to many customers. To get real—use your gestures. Simply hand your customer a mirror and ask her: 

“Have you ever wished for a fuller look in your cheek area?” 

[Press under the apples of your cheeks to explain volume]

“Have you ever done this on your jawline and wished that it would stay?”

[Glide and lift hands along jawline to ear to explain structure]

If she says, yes—New Dimension Shape + Fill Expert Serum is right for her. It’s that easy!

original_administrative_title: ND2 2.2 5 Proven Tips to Make Talking About New Dimension Easier
parent_item_administrative_title: ND2 2.2 5 Proven Tips to Make Talking About New Dimension Easier
administrative_title: ND2 2.2 5 Proven Tips to Make Talking About New Dimension Easier - List 6
subtitle: 5 Proven Tips to Make Talking About New Dimension Easier
list_item_group_text_html:
BONUS: HOW TO REALLY WIN HER OVER

It’s about experience, experience, experience! 

Choose one of the two experiences she can’t get anywhere else:

1. Share how New Dimension fits into her routine by introducing the Beautiful Skin for Life conversation.

2. Show her how she can see contours instantly by teaching her our 3 Minute Beauty Contour Coaching techniques.

original_administrative_title: ND2 3.1 What’s New 3 Exciting New Dimension Innovations
subtitle: What’s New! 3 Exciting New Dimension Innovations
intro_html:
We have three industry-first New Dimension innovations heading to your counters—a Firm + Fill Eye System, Plump + Fill Lip Treatment, and a Tighten + Tone Neck/Chest Treatment. 
Guess what? All three of these targeted treatments— 
• Are powered by the powerful technologies in New Dimension Shape + Fill Expert serum 
• Give you instant and dramatic long-term benefits
• Are first-of-its kind and unlike anything in the industry!
Now click each product to find out what else you really need to know.

hot_spot_text_html:
What will it really do for my eyes? 

We’ve broken the rules on what an eye creme can do. This revolutionary 2-step eye treatment goes beyond hydration by visibly transforming the look of your eye area—imagine addressing virtually every eye wish all in one!

original_administrative_title: ND2 3.1 What’s New 3 Exciting New Dimension Innovations
parent_item_administrative_title: ND2 3.1 What’s New 3 Exciting New Dimension Innovations Hot Spot 1

intro_html: NEW DIMENSION FIRM + FILL EYE SYSTEM
hot_spot_text_html:
How fast will it really work? 

Instantly, the eye area will feel a rush of hydration and a tightening sensation, that’s the Firm working. Then, the Fill smoothes lines and wrinkles—eyes will look transformed.

Over time, you’ll see brighter, more lifted and contoured-looking eyes, dark circles appear reduced.

intro_html: NEW DIMENSION PLUMP + FILL LIP TREATMENT
hot_spot_text_html:
What will it really do for my lips? 

Our first-of-its-kind lip treatment will give you a luscious, plumped look.

First, the serum, which is packed with serious skincare benefits, will smooth lines around the lips, help prevent lipstick from feathering for up to 8 hours and fill and define lips instantly. Then, the addictive balm, loaded with hyaluronic acid, will instantly condition and plump lips, leaving it with a beautiful shine.

Instantly, lip lines disappear and lips look enhanced, contoured, and defined. Lipcolor is prevented from feathering for up to 8 hours. 

Over time, see less lines, and get ultra-hydrated, super smooth, and naturally fuller-looking lips.

hot_spot_text_html:
What will it do?

This advanced gravity-fighting treatment will lift and firm the look of the delicate neck/chest area, stopping the look of creasing and crepiness. Plus, it comes with our exclusive massage tool, which helps to increase microcirculation to visibly energize dull, dry skin. 
Think neck/chest cremes are just for mature customers? Think again. “Tech neck”, the lines we get from looking down at our phones all day, affects us all!

original_administrative_title: ND2 3.2 The Application Tips You Really Need to Know
administrative_title: ND2 3.2 The Application Tips You Really Need to Know
subtitle: The Application Tips You Really Need to Know
content_object_tags_keywords: New Dimension application tips, New Dimension application, New Dimension how to apply, New Dimension how to, New Dimension tips, New Dimension, New Dimension gifs
content_object_headline: The Application Tips You Really Need to Know

original_administrative_title: ND2 3.2 The Application Tips You Really Need to Know
parent_item_administrative_title: ND2 3.2 The Application Tips You Really Need to Know
administrative_title: ND2 3.2 The Application Tips You Really Need to Know - List 1
subtitle: The Application Tips You Really Need to Know
intro_html: NEW DIMENSION FIRM + FILL EYE SYSTEM
list_item_group_text_html:
How do I apply it?
Special twist-and-lock lids on the jars protect the air-sensitive formulas inside—to open or close, simply press down and twist. Be sure the lids are locked into place after every use.

Step 1: Firm 
Apply AM and PM around eye area. Place 3 dots under eye and pat gently to blend. You can be generous with how much you apply.

Step 2: Fill 
Pat sparingly to fill and smooth targeted areas. Use only a pin-sized amount, and pat into skin using a rolling motion, working from outer corner in. Apply anywhere you see lines. Remember,  a little goes a long way!

Pro tips:
• If your eye area is especially dry, give it an extra boost of hydration by applying Advanced Night Repair Eye Serum first, then Steps 1 and 2 of the New Dimension Eye System.

• Smile and gently pat! That will help pinpoint where your lines are when applying the Fill creme.

• For an instant wow, apply the eye system to one eye and show her the transformation.

• Guess what? This eye system will instantly brighten the eye area—you may not even need a concealer.

• If you do wish to use a concealer, use a brush. You can also use a clean fingertip (not the one you used for the Eye System) and apply with a patting motion. This helps keep the Eye System in place for best results.

original_administrative_title: ND2 3.2 The Application Tips You Really Need to Know
parent_item_administrative_title: ND2 3.2 The Application Tips You Really Need to Know
administrative_title: ND2 3.2 The Application Tips You Really Need to Know - List 2
subtitle: The Application Tips You Really Need to Know
intro_html: NEW DIMENSION PLUMP + FILL LIP TREATMENT
list_item_group_text_html:
How do I apply it?

Step 1: Expert Filler 
Apply serum around lips, just outside the lipline. Blend with fingertips. Use AM and PM.

Step 2: Expert Plumper 
Apply balm directly to lips, as often as desired. Follow with lipcolor if desired.

Pro tip:
If applying lip liner, apply it before the hydrating Expert Plumper balm. Then, follow with lip color.

original_administrative_title: ND2 3.2 The Application Tips You Really Need to Know
parent_item_administrative_title: ND2 3.2 The Application Tips You Really Need to Know
administrative_title: ND2 3.2 The Application Tips You Really Need to Know - List 3
subtitle: The Application Tips You Really Need to Know
intro_html: NEW DIMENSION TIGHTEN + TONE NECK/CHEST TREATMENT
list_item_group_text_html:
How do I apply it? 

AM and PM, apply generously over neck and chest area with your fingertips. Add a small amount directly onto the custom massager to ensure a smooth glide, then energize skin using 3 simple motions: 

1. Start at center of chest and glide up one side of neck to just under chin, then back to ear, then down to collarbone. Repeat on same side, then twice on other side. 

2. Sweep the massager back and forth across your upper chest in a shallow "smile" shape. 

3. Finish by sweeping in a curving V shape from one shoulder to the other, dipping down in the center, then back. Clean the applicator thoroughly with tissue, making sure to remove all visible traces of the creme.

Pro tip:
Demonstrate the application technique on half of your customer’s neck so she can see and feel the difference!

original_administrative_title: ND2 3.3 The Top 5 Customer Questions—Answered
parent_item_administrative_title: ND2 3.3 The Top 5 Customer Questions—Answered
administrative_title: ND2 3.3 The Top 5 Customer Questions—Answered - List 1
subtitle: The Top 5 Customer Questions—Answered!
intro_html: NEW DIMENSION FIRM + FILL EYE SYSTEM
list_item_group_text_html:
1. Do I need to use an additional eye creme with it?
No, it’s not necessary. This 2-step expert eye serum is all you need for a more hydrated, firmer, and more contoured eye area. However, if her eye area appears dry or she wishes for more hydration, recommend applying Advanced Night Repair Eye Serum first for an extra boost of hydration and repair. 

2. Can I apply concealer on top of New Dimension Firm + Fill Eye System?
When applying concealer on top, suggest using a formula with more “slip”, like Double Wear Stay-in-Place Flawless Wear Concealer. Recommend using a Concealer Brush to apply in a patting versus a sweeping motion—that way, she won’t move the Filler she just applied. If she wants to use her finger, she should apply her concealer with a clean finger, not the one she just applied her Filler with.

original_administrative_title: ND2 3.3 The Top 5 Customer Questions—Answered
parent_item_administrative_title: ND2 3.3 The Top 5 Customer Questions—Answered
administrative_title: ND2 3.3 The Top 5 Customer Questions—Answered - List 2
subtitle: The Top 5 Customer Questions—Answered!
intro_html: NEW DIMENSION PLUMP + FILL LIP TREATMENT
list_item_group_text_html:
3. Can I apply lip color on top of the treatment?
Of course! Any lip color can be applied directly on top of the New Dimension treatment balm. However, if she’s using a lip liner, recommend applying the lip liner first, then apply the treatment balm—because of its incredible hydration, the moisture it gives lips makes it harder to apply lip liner on top. Then, follow with your lip color.

original_administrative_title: ND2 3.3 The Top 5 Customer Questions—Answered
parent_item_administrative_title: ND2 3.3 The Top 5 Customer Questions—Answered
administrative_title: ND2 3.3 The Top 5 Customer Questions—Answered - List 3
subtitle: The Top 5 Customer Questions—Answered!
intro_html: NEW DIMENSION TIGHTEN + TONE NECK/CHEST TREATMENT
list_item_group_text_html:
4. Can I use New Dimension Tighten + Tone Neck/Chest Treatment on my face?
No, it’s not recommended. Because it’s specially formulated for the delicate neck/chest area, The New Dimension Tighten + Tone Neck/Chest Treatment has extra “slip” and emolliency so it doesn’t tug on skin, especially when she uses the massage tool. For facial skin, recommend that she use New Dimension Shape + Fill Expert Serum and a moisturizer that suits her skin wishes. 

5. Would a younger customer benefit from using New Dimension Tighten + Tone Neck/Chest Treatment?
Yes, the neck and chest area is one of the key areas to show signs of aging—it’s never too early to take extra care of this delicate skin. Plus, “tech neck”, the lines we get from looking down at our phones all day, affects all customers!

original_administrative_title: ND2 4.1 So You’ve Told Her About New Dimension…Now What
administrative_title: ND2 4.1 So You’ve Told Her About New Dimension…Now What
subtitle: So You’ve Told Her About New Dimension…Now What?
intro_html: Telling her about New Dimension is just the first step—take it to the next level by creating an experience she won’t forget. Click the images below to find out the best tips and phrases you can use to link to an experience!
content_object_tags_keywords: New Dimension Experience, Experience, Creating an Experience, Beautiful Skin for Life, Contour Coaching, 3 Minute Beauty Contour Coaching, 3 Minute Beauty, Contouring, Contours, Contour,
content_object_headline: So You’ve Told Her About New Dimension…Now What?

original_administrative_title: ND2 4.1 So You’ve Told Her About New Dimension…Now What
parent_item_administrative_title: ND2 4.1 So You’ve Told Her About New Dimension…Now What
administrative_title: ND2 4.1 So You’ve Told Her About New Dimension…Now What - List 1
subtitle: So You’ve Told Her About New Dimension…Now What?
list_item_group_text_html:
1. Teach her how to contour:

Say: “If you have a few minutes, I’d love to show you how to get an instant transformation with our 3 Minute Beauty Contour Coaching™ technique. Which area of the face would you like to contour—your eyes, lip, or face?

Pro tip: Offer to demonstrate the technique she’s chosen on one side of her face first so she can see the instant transformation. Then, complete the technique on the opposite side.
P.S. Go to “Get in the Contouring Game!” to learn the 3 Minute Beauty Contour Coaching™ techniques!

original_administrative_title: ND2 4.1 So You’ve Told Her About New Dimension…Now What

subtitle: So You’ve Told Her About New Dimension…Now What?
list_item_group_text_html:
2. Offer the Beautiful Skin for Life conversation:

Say: “If you have a few minutes, I’d like to talk about how New Dimension fits into your current skincare ritual…”

Pro tip: Don’t forget to use your tool! Jot down the steps for her new routine, plus any tips you share about how to apply her products.

original_administrative_title: ND2 4.1 So You’ve Told Her About New Dimension…Now What

list_item_group_text_html:
3. Show her the 3 new breakthroughs in the collection:

Say: “Since you love New Dimension, we have 3 new products in the collection for the eyes, lips, and Neck/Chest—which would you like to experience?”

Pro tip:  Demonstrate each of our first-of-a-kind products to your customer, and teach her how to apply them.

original_administrative_title: ND2 5.1 Get In the Contouring Game
administrative_title: ND2 5.1 Get In the Contouring Game
subtitle: Get In the Contouring Game!
intro_html:
Contouring isn’t going away—in fact, the trend’s only getting bigger according to Blair Patterson, Director of Global Artistry at Estée Lauder—so it’s time to get in the game. 

To become a Contour Coach in no time, click below to learn our quick and easy 3 Minute Beauty techniques and learn pro tips (from Blair!) you’ll find first on ELX.
content_object_tags_keywords: Contouring, Contour Coaching, Contour Coach, Contours, Contour, 3 Minute Beauty Contour Coaching, 3 Minute Beauty Contouring, 3 Minute Beauty Contour, 3 Minute Beauty, New Dimension Tips, 3 Minute Beauty Tips, Contour Coaching Tips, Contouring Tips

original_administrative_title: ND2 5.1 Get In the Contouring Game
parent_item_administrative_title: ND2 5.1 Get In the Contouring Game
administrative_title: ND2 5.1 Get In the Contouring Game - List 1
subtitle: Get In the Contouring Game!
list_item_group_text_html:
SCULPTED FACE WITH SKY-HIGH CHEEKBONES

The Look I Want: Fullness in cheeks, a more sculpted jaw, and contoured angles.

What You’ll Need: 
- New Dimension Shape + Fill Expert Serum
- New Dimension Shape + Sculpt Face Kit

How to Get the Look: 

Shape + Fill Serum First: Apply, 2-3 pumps of serum all over face. 

Contour Next: Apply the darker contour creme on the areas where you want to create depth and contour as shown.

Highlight Last: Apply the lighter highlighter creme down center of forehead, nose, Cupid’s bow, chin, and on top of cheekbones, as shown.

Pro Tip: Blend immediately after each area is contoured. Add more as needed for even more definition.
*This is steps 1 & 2 of 3 Minute Beauty E-Z Contouring

original_administrative_title: ND2 5.1 Get In the Contouring Game
parent_item_administrative_title: ND2 5.1 Get In the Contouring Game
administrative_title: ND2 5.1 Get In the Contouring Game - List 2
subtitle: Get In the Contouring Game!
list_item_group_text_html:
DEPTH-DEFINING EYES

The Look I Want: Firmer, smoother, and more lifted look to my eyes.
What You’ll Need: 
- New Dimension Firm + Fill Eye System 
- New Dimension Shape + Sculpt Eye Kit

How to Get the Look: 

Firm + Fill Eye System First: 
Firm Place 3 dots under eye and pat gently to blend. You can be generous with how much you apply. 

Fill Pat sparingly to fill and smooth targeted areas. Use only a pin-sized amount, and pat into skin using a rolling motion, working from outer corner in. Apply anywhere you see lines. Remember, a little goes a long way!

Shape + Sculpt Eye Kit Next: 
Prime Apply this creme base all over the eyelid. Use your fingertips, applicator included, or a Concealer Brush. 

Highlight Sweep along the browbone, and then to the inner corner of the eye—to open and brighten.

Contour Flip the applicator or brush, and apply contour along the lashline, focusing on the outer third of the eye and then up into the crease. Blend to soften the edges. 

Pro Tip: Use corresponding eye shadows over the contour kit to add long-wear intensity and even more dramatic definition.

original_administrative_title: ND2 5.1 Get In the Contouring Game
parent_item_administrative_title: ND2 5.1 Get In the Contouring Game
administrative_title: ND2 5.1 Get In the Contouring Game - List 3
subtitle: Get In the Contouring Game!
list_item_group_text_html:
CONTOURED BROWS

The Look I Want: Fuller, more defined brows to lift my eyes.

What You’ll Need: 
- Double Wear Brush-On Glow BB Highlighter
- Brow Now Brow Defining Pencil

How to Get the Look: 

Shape Brows First: Start at the inside corner of the brow and brush outward, in the direction of the hair growth.

Highlight Next: Apply 3 dots of highlighter above the brow—inner corner, arch peak, and tail. Then, sweep a thin line of highlighter below the brow. Tap to blend with fingertips.

Contour Last: 
For a full brow or to lift the eye, start at the bottom—fill in color from the inner brow to the tail using fine, feathery strokes. 

For a sparse or thin brow, start at the top—apply color from the inner brow to the tail.

Pro Tip: For both brow shapes, brush through brows to distribute color evenly and keep it looking natural. 

*This is 3 Minute Beauty Perfect Brows

original_administrative_title: ND2 5.1 Get In the Contouring Game
parent_item_administrative_title: ND2 5.1 Get In the Contouring Game
administrative_title: ND2 5.1 Get In the Contouring Game - List 4
subtitle: Get In the Contouring Game!
list_item_group_text_html:
PLUMP, MULTI-DIMENSIONAL LIPS

The Look I Want: Natural-looking fullness, definition and hydration.

What You’ll Need: 
- New Dimension Plump + Fill Expert Lip Treatment
- Double Wear Stay-in-Place Lip Pencil in a Nude shade
- Pure Color Envy Sculpting Lipstick in a Nude shade

How to Get the Look: 
[INSERT LP5-1-PlumpLips.jpg HERE] 

Plump + Fill Lip System First: With a Lip Brush, apply serum around lips, along lip contours, and blend with fingertips. Then apply the balm all over lips.

Contour Next: First, outline with a pencil shade slightly deeper than lipstick. Then draw 3 vertical lines down both lips. One in the middle, one on each side.

Color Last: Press lipstick on lightly until lines fade. 

Pro Tip: Use lip liner and lip color in nude shades to enhance your natural lip color.

*This is the lip technique in 3 Minute Beauty E-Z Contouring

original_administrative_title: ND2 5.1 Get In the Contouring Game
parent_item_administrative_title: ND2 5.1 Get In the Contouring Game
administrative_title: ND2 5.1 Get In the Contouring Game - List 5
subtitle: Get In the Contouring Game!
list_item_group_text_html:
SCULPTED, MORE DEFINED FACIAL CONTOURS 

The Look I Want: More sculpted, defined, natural contours. 

What You’ll Need: 
- Double Wear BB Glow Highlighter 
- Bronze Goddess Bronzer

How to Get the Look: 

Highlight First: With highlighter, trace a backward “E” on side of face, starting above brow at inner corner. Glide pen along inside bridge of nose to just below eye - the first arc of the “E”. Then, bring line in toward base of nose and out underneath cheeks and blend.

Contour Next: Dust bronzer in a forward “E” from above brow to hairline, along temple, below cheekbone, along jaw. Repeat other side.

Pro Tip: Contour areas to shape or “push back”. Highlight to “pull forward”.

*This is the 3 Minute Beauty Highlight and Contour Technique
